name: Asian Cooking Star: Food Game
description:
Play this new addictive and fast paced time-management cooking game. Asian Cooking Star: Restaurant Cooking Games. One of the best cooking games available for girls, kids and adults.

Tap to Cook and Serve. No drag and drop food! Download the Free Restaurant Game now!

Also, it’s a crazy time-management game filled with cooking madness and craze. Cook in kitchen and restaurant around Asia.

Travel the Asian Continent and serve Indian, Thai, Japanese, Chinese, and South Korean Cuisines to your customers.

Currently, we have around 30 Restaurant and 800+ levels available to play for our users. Explore this amazing culinary world and have fun while doing it!

Tired of Playing other hard and greedy kitchen and restaurant games? Well, look no further! Tap the complete game for free without spending a single penny.

Create your Own Cooking diary with tons of local and exotic recipes from Indian subcontinent! Cook like you have a cooking fever or you're a crazy chef running your kitchen restaurant. Top Rated Cooking game for girls.

Time-management features will keep you on your toes at every level in this wonderful chef’s restaurant & kitchen games.

Cook and Own Restaurant Around the Asia:
Best Time Management Indian Restaurant & Cooking Simulation game available on App Store.
Explore varieties of dishes: Start your culinary journey from India and explore various cuisines and food from Japan,Thailand, China, America, South Korean, Saudi Arab, Russia etc in this addictive & time-management cooking game.

Food Never Looked So Delicious:
Addictive gameplay and lucious graphics. Food looks really tasty and colorful. Explore the exotic food of Asia.

Love Desserts? Well, we have plenty of restaurants available for a chef like you to bake and cook some delicious sweets. Be the Masterchef of your exciting and fun culinary journey.


Fun and Fast-Paced Gameplay:
Tons of Challenging Levels (currently more than 800) and around 30 different restaurants.
Use boosters to add some more fun and support in an addictive time-management cooking game. Use boosters to elevate your cooking game playing experience.

Time Management Cooking Games:
One of the best cooking games available on the App store for casual gamers. High production value and deep research went into the game, to create amazing recipes and culturally appropriate food. We did ask around some chef about various dishes and cuisines you see in the game.

Asian Cooking Star is a FREE Chef Restaurant Cooking Simulation game. This is not just a cooking game for girls but adults can play and have some great fun too.
Download Today!

This game has a subscription-based premium feature package, it enables users to use the app without advertisements and with extra features. It's an auto-renewable subscription. The subscription period is weekly. Payment is charged to the App Store account at confirmation. Subscription is renewed unless turned off 24 hours before the end of the period, and the account will be automatically charged for renewal as well. You may turn it off in your Account Settings anytime.

Privacy Policy: https://asiancooking.matchingham.gs/pp.html
